channel.title: Need help
channel.description: Hey, uhm What do i do in order to make my client work when others use it? Like how to i make it so when someone downloads the client i have, when i run my source it will turn on my server for others? Someone said change ip, but idk where the ip is i have to change. I am using the Edgeville Pking source.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @koreybarnett koreybarnett
item.description:
@koreybarnett wrote:

to into the client files and open the gui.java file
press ctrl+f and search for serverip, it should look something like this

System.out.println("Attempting to Connect"); Serverip = "0.0.0.0"; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

if i replaced my 0.0.0.0 with my ip address or no-ip address then people would be able to connect to my server if they had my client.

just replace the current ip with your ip but make sure the " thingys are there

Read full topic
